headline: Taekwondo Provided an Outlet for 2 Children. And It Gave Their Mother a Break.
abstract: Frances Ramirez was juggling three jobs with her responsibilities as a single parent when she got help paying for her children’s lessons.
lead_paragraph: Both of Frances Ramirez’s children — Edwin, 8, and Emma Jade, 6 — have attention-deficit hyperactivity disorder, which makes it difficult for them to sit still, focus or follow directions. Often, Ms. Ramirez said, she feels as if she has to fight to get through to them.
keywords: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
